mutants.code:
import math

def calculate_max_audience_times(T, test_cases):

    def fun(num1, num2):
        if num1 >= num2:
            a = num1
            b = num2
        else:
            a = num2
            b = num1
        rem = a % b
        while rem != 0:
            a = b
            b = rem
            rem = a % b
        gcd = b
        return int(num1 * num2 / gcd)
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, x, y, z) = case
        hours = N * 24
        lcm = x
        lcm = fun(x, y)
        lcm = fun(lcm, z)
        results.append(int(hours // lcm))
    return results

def calculate_max_audience_times(T, test_cases):

    def fun(num1, num2):
        if num1 > num2:
            a = num1
            b = num2
        else:
            a = num2
            b = num1
        rem = a % b
        while rem != 0:
            a = b
            b = rem
            rem = a % b
        gcd = b
        return int((num1 + num2) / gcd)
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, x, y, z) = case
        hours = N * 24
        lcm = x
        lcm = fun(x, y)
        lcm = fun(lcm, z)
        results.append(int(hours // lcm))
    return results
